```{r}
library(readr)
library(tidyverse)
```


```{r}
homicides <- read_csv(file = "data/homicide-data.txt")
```
```{r}
head(homicides)
```

```{r}
homicides <- homicides %>% 
  unite(col= city_name, city, state, sep=", ") 
```

```{r}
balt_homicides <- homicides %>% 
  filter(city_name == "Baltimore, MD")
```
